title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate Today – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
May 11, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:David J. Kautter, of Virginia, to be an Assistant Secretary of the Treasury, vice Mark J. Mazur.Brock Long, of North Carolina, to be Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency, Department of Homeland Security, vice William Craig Fugate, resigned.
